Title: ADC risks breaching rotational presidency principle over Atiku — Okechukwu
Summary: Osita Okechukwu has warned that the African Democratic Congress (ADC) risks breaching Nigeria’s rotational presidency convention due to the growing influence of former Vice President Atiku Abubakar . The founding member of the All Progressives Congress (APC) has accused Atiku of growing influence .

Title: Delta Assembly raises expectations for 2026 as Deltans await impact
Summary: Delta State House of Assembly resumes plenary following Christmas and New Year recess . Expectations are rising over whether the legislature will move beyond rhetoric to deliver concrete solutions to the state’s mounting socio-economic challenges .

Title: SERAP takes INEC to court over alleged mismanagement of N55.9b election funds
Summary: SERAP takes INEC to court over alleged mismanagement of N55.9b election funds . The Socio-Economic Rights and Accountability Project (SERAP) has asked a Federal High Court in Abuja to compel the Independent National Electoral Commission (INEC) to publicly account for the funds .

Title: North vs West as Morocco, Nigeria, Egypt, Senegal set for blockbuster semi-finals
Summary: Morocco, Nigeria, Egypt, Senegal, Egypt and Senegal set for blockbuster semi-final line-up . The 2025 Africa Cup of Nations (AFCON) was confirmed on Saturday night . Hosts Morocco advanced after a 2-0 win over Nigeria in the quarter-finals .

Title: Health sector gets N2.1tr as NMA condemns allocation
Summary: Nigeria’s health sector has been allocated N2.1 trillion in the 2026 Federal Budget . The level of funding remains significantly below the target set by African leaders under the 2001 Abuja Declaration .

Title: Fubara, Deputy make first public appearance after impeachment notice
Summary: Rivers State Governor, Sir Siminalayi Fubara, and his deputy, Prof. Ngozi Nma Odu, made their first public appearance after impeachment notice . Rivers State House of Assembly initiated impeachment proceedings against them .

Title: Tinubu broke education pact, abandoned students abroad — Atiku alleges
Summary: Tinubu broke education pact, abandoned students abroad — Atiku alleges . Atiku said the BEA scholarship scheme was quietly discontinued under the Tinubus administration .

Title: AFCON 2025: Nigeria vs. Algeria was a statement, not a match
Summary: An elite, coached performance defined by spacing, clear roles, and technical automatisms . This was an elite performance . Nigeria vs Algeria was a statement, not a match .

Title: Army intensifies clearance operations in Kwara, Niger
Summary: The Nigerian Army has intensified clearance and internal security operations across parts of Kwara and Niger states to contain banditry, kidnapping and other security threats in the North Central region .

Title: Plateau presents relief materials to attack victims in Nasarawa
Summary: Plateau Government presents relief materials to attack victims in Nasarawa . The Director General of the Nasarwa State Emergency Management Agency, Mr Benjamin Akwash, lauded the gesture .
